gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `InvestmentProperties` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `InvestmentProperties` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `InvestmentPropertiesMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentPropertiesEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentPropertiesEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentPropertiesStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentPropertiesStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentPropertiesMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentPropertiesMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`InvestmentPropertiesActualCostPrice` BEHOORT NIET gerapporteerd te worden, omdat `InvestmentPropertiesCostPrice` gerapporteerd. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_InvestmentPropertiesCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_InvestmentPropertiesCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_InvestmentPropertiesActualCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_InvestmentPropertiesActualCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`InvestmentPropertiesMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende domeinleden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`InvestmentPropertiesMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende domeinleden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`InvestmentPropertiesMovement` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_InvestmentPropertiesMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_InvestmentPropertiesMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentPropertiesMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentPropertiesMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentPropertiesMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentPropertiesMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`InvestmentProperties` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_InvestmentProperties')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_InvestmentProperties return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfInvestmentPropertiesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfInvestmentPropertiesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfInvestmentPropertiesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfInvestmentPropertiesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`InvestmentProperties` gerapporteerd met `ClassesOfInvestmentPropertiesAxis` en `InvestmentPropertiesMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan `InvestmentProperties` zonder `ClassesOfInvestmentPropertiesAxis` en `InvestmentPropertiesMember`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfInvestmentPropertiesAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfInvestmentPropertiesAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfInvestmentPropertiesAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfInvestmentPropertiesAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
